titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 933) making appropriations for the Department of Defense, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and other departments and agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2013, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-12, by Mr. Cole.
The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the bill. The resolution waives all points of order against provisions in the bill, as amended.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 6.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 99.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 188 (Roll no. 59).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 197 (Roll no. 60).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/5/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 933) making appropriations for the Department of Defense, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and other departments and agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2013.
